summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 4168 lux), and cloud levels (up 536 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1467 m), light levels (up 6480 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 536.0m lower than yesterday, 1041.6m lower than past week, 1466.8m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1337.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Chance of light rain, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and bright intervals likely. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
